text: A Night on the Town is the seventh album by Rod Stewart and was released on 18 June 1976 through Warner Bros. Records. The album cover is based on Pierre- Auguste Renoir's painting Bal du moulin de la Galette. The album was reissued in 2009 as a double disc with bonus tracks. It topped the single charts in Australia, Canada, New Zealand, Norway, Sweden and the United Kingdom. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 5 in the Netherlands and number 29 in Germany. == Track listing == === Original release === === 2009 re-release === Category:1976 albums Category:Rod Stewart albums Category:Warner Records albums
title: A Night on the Town (Rod Stewart album)
